techmeme.title: USCIS data shows Amazon got the most H-1B visas each year from 2020 to 2024; Google, Meta, Microsoft, and Apple ranked in the top 10 in 2024 (Ananya Bhattacharya/Rest of World)

TRAI Chairman Anil Kumar Lahoti says India, with only 1% of global subsea cable landing stations, must expand its subsea cable infrastructure 10x to meet demand (Karan Mahadik/The Indian Express)
State and former US officials say satellite internet like Starlink's may cut upfront costs for the $42B rural broadband program but could cost more long term (Kelcee Griffis/Bloomberg)
As the EU considers funding a Starlink rival, experts say no single European network can match Starlink's range, likely requiring a patchwork of satellites (Financial Times)
